title: massive lag issues making game unplayable
body:
over the past few days the server lag has made the game almost unplayable. the screen freezes out in game so that i can't scroll the screen or move properly and i can't use my abilities. the ping counter doesn't change which makes it all the more certain this is server lag

- i have one of the fastest mobile broadband connections in the world
- no issues with any other games

riot, please fix

replies.body: Are you completely frozen and on Windows 10?  I'm wondering if this a connection issue, or a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  An update auto-enabled the bar which has completely frozen some players.  Disabling that should help.  Let me know!
i don't have xbox and there is no app on my windows 10 for xbox either

Many players don't use the app, but because it auto-enabled you might be experiencing it so I suggest checking out the link just in case.  We can also look at other possibilities like your network strength.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches you're having this freezing to see if there's an issue staying connected to the game server.  Let me know what you find.

i submitted the logs. i have a high ping of around 230 ms which is normal since i'm from hong kong. packet loss is from 0.1% to 2%. no other issues with the connection

i have checked out the xbox link. there is no such app on my computer

on my most recent game, other players were experiencing same type of lag in game

Thanks for trying all that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs to your ticket to provide more context on your case.  We'll reply asap!
The log claimed my highest ping was 51 and I had "mininal" packet loss, a stable connection. Yet it describes exactly my issue, sliding, delayed castings etc.
experienced exactly the issues you listed :(
You do have it. It is a windows 10 feature. I think it is not enabled by default anymore. I looked into it and it requires a sign in through the Xbox app.

Actually, there was more than one log for the same game, as mentioned, I restarted the game. Average ping 48 m/s, Your percentage of packet loss for this game was 24.33%. But a simple close and click "reconnect" fixed this.

I can second this. I have the same issue, and it just happened to me in ranked; and it is not the first time. I hit around 48 m/s ping and all of a sudden my champion just goes all Mundo. I restarted the game after I died, and it seemed to work fine afterwards. I currently am with support who has seen "packet loss" in my logs, however, as the above user, I am on good internet; Fibre Optical, and I already been checked locally.

my cousin and i have been experiencing this as well, we're not on the same connection but we both get the same laggy experience during the games we play together. my ping will stay around 49-60 the entire game and my fps is capped at 60 but i still get insane lag, sometimes like 3 seconds or more. 
ive tried everything lately, its almost unplayable
